title: Post-Game Screen Loading Slowly?
body:
Anyone else having this issue? After a game, the post-game menu takes ages to load, much slower than anything else in the client.

Takes sometimes upwards to a minute, even on lowest settings.

replies.body: If it's taking that long to load, there's a pretty good chance that you have the option "close client during game" turned on. Go into your client options, **uncheck close client** and let me know how much faster those after match lobbies load up!
Yep, fixed it. Slightly lower fps in game, but post-game menu loads immediately.
